news.title: Winter fuel payment U-turn in place this year, says chancellor
news.summary: Chancellor Rachel Reeves says that more people will get winter fuel payment "this winter", but details of who is eligible remain unclear.

news.title: Police launch probe into patient deaths at NHS hospital after heart operations
news.summary: Patients who died at Castle Hill Hospital near Hull may have suffered avoidable harm, documents suggest.

news.title: Madeleine McCann search goes on but is it 18 years too late?
news.summary: Searches have resumed in Portugal nearly two decades after the three-year-old went missing.

news.title: 'I need a hug' - Singer Jessie J says she has breast cancer
news.summary: The singer says she will "disappear for a bit" to have surgery.

news.title: Man killed in racist attack told police he saw similar assault weeks before death
news.summary: Another Asian man was assaulted by two boys two weeks before Bhim Kohli was fatally attacked.

news.title: BBC rejects incorrect White House claims on Gaza coverage
news.summary: The corporation says claims that a story was removed from its website are "completely wrong".

news.title: 'Delayed review into my daughter's killing has left me broken'
news.summary: The reviews aim to prevent future attacks but just 1% are completed on time, BBC research suggests.

news.title: Meghan shares new photos of Lilibet to mark fourth birthday
news.summary: The Duchess of Sussex releases rare photos of Princess Lilibet to mark her birthday.

news.title: Why Labour is strengthening ties with China after years of rollercoaster relations
news.summary: To some, it’s a smart opportunity. To others there are security concerns. But either way, is there a playbook?

news.title: Watch: Searching derelict and desolate area in Madeleine McCann case
news.summary: Police are searching an area where prime suspect, Christian Brückner, stayed at the time of Madeleine's disappearance.
